dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Confidence Level
dimensions.description: How confident is your FarTwin in their interactions?

options.description: Your FarTwin exudes self-assurance and unwavering confidence in all social situations.
Your FarTwin struggles with self-doubt and often requires reassurance from others.

dimensions.label: Intelligence Type
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach knowledge acquisition?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a critical thinker, preferring to break down complex concepts into smaller parts for in-depth analysis.
Your FarTwin approaches knowledge by considering the big picture, seeking connections and patterns between seemingly unrelated ideas.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a social butterfly, effortlessly navigating diverse groups and making new connections.
Your FarTwin prefers smaller, more intimate gatherings and may need time to recharge after social interactions.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin strives for flawlessness, often spending excessive time on a single task to ensure it meets their high standards.
Your FarTwin balances efficiency with effectiveness, prioritizing tasks based on urgency and impact.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How openly does your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin wears their heart on their sleeve, freely expressing their emotions to those around them.
Your FarTwin tends to keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals or when necessary.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin relies on reason and evidence to inform their decision-making, breaking down complex problems into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin trusts their instincts and gut feelings to guide them through challenging situations.

dimensions.label: Ambition Level
dimensions.description: How driven is your FarTwin towards success?

options.description: Your FarTwin is extremely ambitious, setting lofty goals and working tirelessly to achieve them.
Your FarTwin has a more relaxed approach to success, prioritizing personal fulfillment over external recognition.
